##Exercise 4

Wordle Challenge Loading in my packages and data sets. Viewing them to get an idea of what they look like.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
f<-"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-datasets/main/collins-scrabble-words-2019.txt" #choose my dataset
d<- read_csv(f, col_names = TRUE)
view(d)
e<- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-datasets/main/google-10000-english-usa-no-swears.txt"
g<- read_csv(e, col_names = TRUE)
view(g)
```
